::Reptilica::

Reptilica looks Feline over, a bit impressed at the completely 
metallic superstructure.

"Not bad," he says. "How'd you lose your beast mode?"



--- In nbwrpg@y..., logomorph@h... wrote:
> Feline::
> 
> She sat in her chair as the shuttle landed. She stood up and heard 
> Reptilica ask about her.  She went to transform into her leopard 
mode 
> out of habit, and instead, transformed into a cat mode. But it 
looked 
> like she was a chrome panther or something.  She looked at herself 
> and sighed. "No, it's no good. I'm completely without a mode. It's 
> useless. I'm useless."  She transformed into bot mode and walked 
off 
> the shuttle.  She was still stunning, but without a beast mode, she 
> was all  in chrome.
